comment: This woman is so kind, she cares so much about her students and the subject. She has discussions that get everyone talking and it is an entertaining class in general. She is very easy going and understanding.

She provides clear grading criteria, outlines the course in the beginning, making it easy for you to keep up, provides multiple points of contact so you can reach out for help at any time. Her lectures were engaging and interesting. Even when we went off topic, I always left with more knowledge than I came in with. HIGHLY recommend taking her!

She is a great professor! Her online class consists of weekly discussion posts and quizzes that are easy and manageable. Plenty of time given for midterm and final and one easy paper required. She is caring and understanding. (I took her during the COVID-19 pandemic and she was so encouraging and validating). What a deserving professor.
